EN:
It is an essential part of the crypto-donate.net solution.
The main purpose of the extension is to allow the user to send selected cryptocurrencies as a donation along with the text message.
The recipients of the donation are assumed to be live streamers, but may also include other users as well.
Being on a live stream on youtube or twitch, the plug-in automatically searches for the recipient's address in the stream description as soon as the plug-in is opened.
Moreover, thanks to this solution, you are able to send a paid message without opening a new tab in the browser - so you will not miss any important live stream situations.

for more information see website http://crypto-donate.net
